title: Graph Explorer
description: Graph-explorer is an open-source low-code visual exploration tool for graph data, available under the Apache-2.0 license. It lets you browse either labeled property graphs (LPG) or Resource Description Framework (RDF) data in a graph database without having to write graph queries. Graph-explorer is intended to help data scientists, business analysts, and other roles in an organization explore graph data interactively without having to learn a graph query language.
